resources.string: Something went wrong. Perhaps you don\'t currently have an internet connection. I\'d love to let you in, but some people might abuse this. If you think something weird is going on, here are some links. (Often this check will only work over wifi, I\'m not sure why, but try it. And if wifi doesn\'t work, try 3G.)
I made a mistake in the licensing code. I would love for you to send me an email telling me about this incident. The email is completely filled out for you, all you have to do is press send.

Strobe v%1$s (%2$d) 
Device type: %3$s 
Device Firmware: %4$s 
Error: Licensing application error: %5$d
